Key Match Events: Paul George scored 9 points, 4 rebounds, 8 assists, and 1 steal while shooting 4/13 from the field and 0/6 from the three-point range in 25 minutes of playing time.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 76ers lost by a score of 116-106 to fall to 1-7 in their first eight games.
Others: The 76ers will play their next game on Sunday when they host LaMelo Ball and the Charlotte Hornets.
